original: 泰山南城人，東漢官員，羊祜之祖父。漢末著名的清官賢臣，「前庭懸魚」的逸事流傳千古。出任地方官頗有治績，曾數度討平黃巾軍和賊亂。
text: A native of Taishan Nancheng, an official of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the grandfather of Yanghu. In the late Han Dynasty, the anecdote of "hanging fish in the vestibule", a famous upright official and minister, has been passed down through the ages. Serving as a magistrate is quite accomplished, and has repeatedly flattened the Yellow Turban Army and the riots.
